meanings.definition: A person or thing that has no equal or match.
meanings.sent1: In the competition, she proved to be a nonsuches, winning every round effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The majestic mountain stood as a nonsuches among the rolling hills.
meanings.sent3: The cat believed itself to be a nonsuches among the other pets in the house.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was a nonsuches, shining brightly in a world of indifference.
meanings.sent5: The rare flower was a nonsuches, captivating all who beheld its beauty.

meanings.definition: A model of excellence or perfection.
meanings.sent1: The new sports car was a nonsuches, combining speed and style flawlessly.
meanings.sent2: The painting was considered a nonsuches in the art gallery, admired by all visitors.
meanings.sent3: The cake she baked was a nonsuches, disappearing within minutes at the party.
meanings.sent4: His performance on stage was a nonsuches, leaving the audience in awe.
meanings.sent5: The sunset over the ocean was a nonsuches, painting the sky with vibrant colors.
